tool.name: SC3 K-Means

param.name: sc3_transformed
param.label: Serialised sc3 SingleCellExperiment object with transformed distances

param.name: method
param.label: Method to supply K
param.option: Provide a text file containing K

param.name: input_k
param.label: Integer K as the number of clusters for kmeans

data.name: sc3_kmeans
data.label: ${tool.name} on ${on_string}: serialised sc3 SingleCellExperiment object storing the k-means clusters

tool.help:
========================================= This function performs kmeans clustering. =========================================
It uses transformed distance matrix contained in the transformations item of the sc3 slot of the metadata(object). It then creates and populates the following items of the sc3 slot:
- kmeans: contains a list of kmeans clusterings.
@HELP@
